text: hi everybody and welcome in this video
we're going to talk about this and that
now this and that are used to talk about
mounds that are close to us near or far
away ok so let's look at the board this
is a flower okay we use this to talk
about one noun a flower that is close ok
this is a flower it's not far it's close
that is a flower okay we use that to
talk about one noun that's far away so
that that is a flower okay for another
example this is a marker it's close to
me but that that is a marker it's far
away okay let's move on to the next part
okay so we know this is a flower okay

okay
this isn't a flower this is a chair that
isn't a flower it's far away so we say

this isn't a pencil this is a marker and
that
